title: EYL #126 Jim Jones on Cryptocurrency, NFTs, The Music Business, Fitness, & Swag
itunes:title: EYL #126 Jim Jones on Cryptocurrency, NFTs, The Music Business, Fitness, & Swag
description:
For episode 126, we had the honor of talking to a cultural icon and one of the sharpest minds in the music business. Jim Jones has helped shape culture for the past 20 years, through music, fashion, and swag. 


In EYL 126, he pulled up to the EYL headquarters and gave us game on his experience in the music business, NFTs, and Cryptocurrency. He also told us about his revolutionary New Age music company that has the potential to change the game for artists, fashion, and of course, we had to talk about Harlem swag and Dipset’s undeniable impact on generations. #jimjones #vamplife #capocoin


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?igshid=1xxyi7wafxf7a


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/jimjonescapo?igshid=7lylae99s0tb


70% off EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Save 20% on your order of G.O.A.T. Fuel Enter Code: EYL20

https://goatfuel.com
